name: Pop Monters Cube Boom
description:
Pop Monters Cube Boom is puzzle PopStar classic games, FREE and Fun!The game is challenging, it look easy at start to help you learn it but afterwards you will have the think hard and consider your tactics.

Game Features:
- Hours of endless cubes-blasting fun!
- Fun and fairly challenging barriers
- Colorful graphics and amazing animations.
- Solve all the puzzles and clear the board.
- There are almost 250 levels in toy pop fever.
